title.narrative: Accelerating Higher Education Expansion and Development Operation

description.narrative: The program development objective (PDO) is to increase enrollment in priority disciplines, improve the quality of degree programs and promote research and innovation in the higher education sector.

title.narrative: Faculty-level systems for ELTA and ELSE through competitive grants developed and outcomes achieved

target.value: At least 20 faculties awarded ELTA-ELSE grants have achieved 80 percent of their outcome targets related to the promotion ofacademic learning combined with interactions between university students and the world of work.

actual.value: 15 Faculties which were awarded ELTA ELSE Development Projects under the second round have achieved at least 50 percent of theiroutcome targets related to the promotion of academic learning combined with interactions between university students and the worldof work.

title.narrative: University-level systems for Research and Development Innovation, and Commercialization (RDIC) programs developed and outcomes achieved

target.value: At least 48 RDIC program grants under the first and second rounds have achieved 80 percent of their outcome targets.

actual.value: Forty nine Round 2 DOR, RIC and ICE projects have achieved 50 percent of their outcome targets.

title.narrative: Citizen engagement: Stakeholder feedback surveys conducted

target.value: End-term stakeholder feedback survey conducted and feedback utilized for the updating of the Higher Education Strategy.Satisfaction levels of stakeholders increased by 30 percent over the baseline.

actual.value: The survey was delayed due to the curfew in the country as a result of the Covid19 pandemic. A survey was commenced but was teninterrupted by multiple waves of the pandemic. It is expected that a proper survey could be conducted in 2022.

title.narrative: Number of entity audit reports available within stipulated time period after end of financial year

baseline.value: 10 out of 17 entities had the FY14 audit reports available within 12 months of the end of the financial year, that is, by December31, 2015.

target.value: All 17 entities have the FY20 audit reports available within 9 months of the end of the financial year, that is, by September 30,2021.

actual.value: 14 entities had FY19 audit reports available within 9 months of the end of the financial year, that is, by September 30, 2019.Information on the other 3 institutions, UGC, VAPA and SLIATE, is being followed up.

title.narrative: Enrollment in HEI STEM undergraduate degree programs increased
Enrollment in SLIATE STEM programs increased
University IQAUs function to specified standards
Percentage of cash released, by Treasury against the cash requests, for the items in the program expenditure framework channeled through the regular treasury system
Increased quality assurance of the university system

baseline.value: A QA review system has been developed. A new sequence of QA reviews of universities, based on updated manuals, will be implementedfrom 2018 onwards.

target.value: Quality assurance reviews of at least 90 percent of the universities completed and ratings published.

actual.value: QA reviews completed and published for 50% of universities.

title.narrative: Universities develop business linkage (UBL) offices functioning to specified standards

target.value: UBL offices functioning to specified standards in at least 80 percent of the universities

actual.value: UBL offices functioning to specified standards in 65 percent of the universities.

title.narrative: Students benefiting from direct interventions to enhance learning
Students benefiting from direct interventions to enhance learning - Female
